descriptionSettings: Manage your account settings and set e-mail preferences

account.title: Account
account.emailDescription: This is the email address we will use to contact you. It will not be publicly visible.
account.identifiactionDescription: This is your identification number. It will not be publicly visible.
account.name: Name
account.nameDescription: This is your public display name. It can be your real name or a pseudonym.
account.languageDescription: Select the language you prefer to use the application in.

security.passwordDescription: If you change your password, all your active sessions will be logged out.
security.twoFactorDescription: Add an extra layer of security to your account
security.passwordDescription2FA: In order to enable 2FA, please enter your password.

qrCode.manualSecretDescription: Scan this QR code with your authenticator app or enter the secret manually.
qrCode.otpDescription: Enter the 6-digit code from your authenticator app.

backupCodes.generateBackupCodesDescription: Generate a set of backup codes to use if you lose your authenticator app. Generating new codes will invalidate the old ones.
backupCodes.passwordDescription: Enter your current password to generate new backup codes.
backupCodes.downloadBackupCodesDescription: Save these codes in a safe place. Each code can be used once.
